fullName: User Registration Testing: Validate invalid user registration scenarios
name: Validate invalid user registration scenarios

steps.name: Given  a user with firstName "Vaishnavi", lastName "SriVidya", email "vaishnavi_srividya2603@gmail.com", and password "Abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvw$1"
When  I submit the registration request

Then  I should receive registration response with status code 400 and message "Invalid registration request: Password must be 8-16 characters long and include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character."

parameters.name: expectedMessage
parameters.value: Invalid registration request: Password must be 8-16 characters long and include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
